SELECT * FROM sys_function_list sfl WHERE sfl.id NOT IN ( SELECT scfr.function_id FROM sys_content_function_rel scfr GROUP BY scfr.function_id ) AND sfl.deleted = false
AND sfl.function_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{functionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY sfl.last_updated_date DESC

SELECT b.content_id as contentId, c.content_name as contentName, c.content_router as contentRouter, c.parent_id as parentId, c.sequence_number as contentSequenceNumber, c.has_son_content as hasSonContent, a.id as functionId, a.function_name as functionName, a.function_router as functionRouter, a.param as param, a.sequence_number as functionSequenceNumber, a.page_id as pageId, a.function_icon as functionIcon, a.application_id as applicationId FROM sys_function_list a LEFT JOIN sys_content_function_rel b ON a.id = b.function_id LEFT JOIN sys_content_list c ON b.content_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 WHERE a.deleted = 0
and lower(coalesce(a.param, '0')) != 'system'
order by c.sequence_number, a.sequence_number
